body.p: Getting started with and the is quite a challenge. Advantages over other documentation approaches can be only achieved, once a complete infrastructure - a tool chain - is defined and managed consequently.
This document is part of the {met√¶ffekt} DITA Tool Chain. It demonstrates how content can be organized and transformed to different outputs, such as and .
The content of this document is used as reference to demonstrate the features and capabilities of the tool chain. As such the content is often artificial.

This short introduction already illustrates the powerPower of the toolchain to a great extend. Mind the references to the glossary. The glossary is context specific to the document that is produced and based on existing term definitions.
Glossary terms use key references. This means a reference that does not point directly to an existing file, but an identifier (key) that is then mapped to a file from the ditamap.
